entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@MSNBC Trump should close down the current WH pandemic team. Pence is useless, other than in his role as Trump’s rectal thermometer.

Let Dr. Fauci take full charge and report to the nation honestly and openly. @realDonaldTrump and @VP are neither competent nor credible. #COVIDー19
